name: CVE-2022-26024
description: Improper access control in the Intel(R) NUC HDMI Firmware Update Tool for NUC7i3DN, NUC7i5DN and NUC7i7DN before version 1.78.2.0.7 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i3dnbe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i3dnbe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i3dnhe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i3dnhe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i3dnhnc_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i3dnhnc:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i3dnke_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i3dnke:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i3dnktc_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i3dnktc:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i5dnbe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i5dnbe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i5dnhe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i5dnhe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i5dnke_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i5dnke:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i7dnbe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i7dnbe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i7dnhe_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i7dnhe:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc7i7dnke_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc7i7dnke:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
